## OmvDataSourceParameters.tileFactory property

Optional, custom factory for \[\[Tile\]\] instances created by this \[\[OmvDataSource\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tileFactory?: TileFactory<OmvTile>;
```
